newsitems.title: ПК-геймеры начали закупаться Spider-Man и Spider-Man: Miles Morales после премьеры Spider-Man 2 на PlayStation 5
newsitems.author: Павел Вескер
newsitems.contents: Популярность компьютерных версий Spider-Man и Spider-Man: Miles Morales от Insomniac Games и Sony Interactive Entertainment пошла вверх после премьеры Spider-Man 2 на PlayStation 5. Об этом свидетельствует свежий чарт продаж Steam.

newsitems.title: Grab up to 40% off the Marvel's Spider-Man series in huge Steam sale
newsitems.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
newsitems.contents: Great news web-heads, You can currently grab up to 40% off Marvel's Spider-Man games over on Steam. Both Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered and Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales are heavily discounted in the sale, so act fast if you've yet to swing into the series. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: The best games like Spider-Man Remastered on PC 2023 Snag the fantastic Spider-Man games super cheap, if you're quick PlayStation gives a PC port update but don't hope for Bloodborne

newsitems.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered v.2.1012.0.0 Patch Notes
newsitems.author: Nixxes_Community
newsitems.contents: Hey everyone, Today’s update for Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered contains various optimizations and fixes. We’ve made CPU performance improvements for ray-tracing, and made performance and stability improvements for ray-tracing on AMD GPUs. Intel Xe Super Sampling has been updated to version 1.2, with support for dynamic resolution scaling. This update also tweaks the launcher interface to fit better on low resolutions or high DPI scaling screens. See the patch notes below for more details on changes in this update. Thanks everyone for playing and for sharing feedback that helped us to further improve the game! Patch Notes Corrected an issue with left stick diagonal controller input when Steam Input is not active. Adjusted the launcher to fit on screens with low resolutions or high DPI scaling settings. Updated Intel XeSS to version 1.2.0, with support for dynamic resolution scaling. Improvements to CPU performance for ray-tracing and crowd spawning. Performance and stability improvements for ray-tracing on AMD GPUs. Stability improvements for AMD RDNA 3 GPUs. Fixed an issue that caused heavy screen blur when using an upscaler on very low resolutions. Resolved a crash that could occur when changing resolution and dynamic resolution scaling at the same time in Display settings If you experience any problems after updating to the latest version, please contact us using this link. As a workaround, you can revert to the previous version of the game. To do this, right-click on the game in Steam, select Properties, then Betas, and select Previous_Version from the drop-down menu. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/42522856/93323aa5c35d14ba5fd37bf5415b22f83ae89c92.jpg

newsitems.title: Креативный директор Insomniac Games: Студия стала лучше после присоединения к PlayStation
newsitems.author: Дмитрий Чистяков
newsitems.contents: Креативный директор Insomniac Games Брайан Интихар заявил, что дела в студии стали лучше после присоединения к PlayStation .

newsitems.title: Sony снова повысила цены на свои игры в турецком Steam — сильно подорожали приключения Человека-паука
newsitems.author: Илья Корпылёв
newsitems.contents: Несколько дней назад Sony увеличила стоимость Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart и The Last of Us Part I в турецком Steam, однако вскоре изменения коснулись и других игр издателя.

newsitems.title: Купленная Sony студия Nixxes Software занимается разработкой неанонсированных ремастеров
newsitems.author: Дмитрий Чистяков
newsitems.contents: Компания Sony, по всей видимости, готовит новые ремастеры своих старых игр. Намек на это сделала одна из внутренних студий.

newsitems.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered v.2.616.0.0 Hotfix
newsitems.author: Nixxes_Community
newsitems.contents: Hey everyone, This update contains a fix for an issue that was introduced in a patch we released earlier this month. Changes made in that version prevented the voice-over language from changing correctly for some users on Steam. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused. Release Notes Implemented a fix to address issues with changing the voice-over language on Steam. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/42522856/b8fafdd32c8d88f0025bb729c3c0285493528f25.png

newsitems.title: Snag the fantastic Spider-Man games super cheap, if you're quick
newsitems.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
newsitems.contents: The Marvel's Spider-Man games are, for my money, the best Sony PlayStation exclusives on PC so far (although Ratchet & Clank does arrive in July). Topping the likes of God of War, Horizon, and The Last of Us, Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered and Miles Morales are two of the most fun action-adventure games going and have excellent PC ports to match. Now thanks to a Steam sale, you can get both games at their lowest price ever on the Valve storefront ahead of Spider-Man 2 - just make sure you swing into action fast (I couldn't help it). Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: PlayStation gives a PC port update but don't hope for Bloodborne The best games like Spider-Man Remastered on PC 2023 Spider-Man Remastered patch improves DLSS, FSR, and fixes bugs

newsitems.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered v.2.512.0.0 Patch Notes
newsitems.author: Nixxes_Community
newsitems.contents: Hey everyone, Today we are releasing an update for Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered with improved Bluetooth support for Sony PlayStation DualShock and DualSense controllers. Adaptive trigger feedback on DualSense controllers is now available when using Steam Input. To use the full range of DualSense features, including the controller speaker and haptic feedback, a wired USB connection is required. This update also finetunes optimizations for some Intel CPUs and we have updated the game to use Intel Xe Super Sampling version 1.1. Thank you for all your feedback and contributions that helped us improve the game. Patch Notes Improved Bluetooth support for DualShock and DualSense controllers. DualSense adaptive trigger feedback is now available with Steam Input. Updated Intel XeSS to version 1.1. Finetuned CPU optimizations for some Intel CPUs. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/42522856/0b2653030c3dd10de58cf8764e860769cba0c725.jpg
